name: Connection Hopper
description:
Connection Hopper is a freighthopping game in which you need to catch a ride to the ocean to escape poverty. Play the standalone builds for the intended experience (WebGL has aspect ratio issues).

How to play

Move with WASD and interact with E (trains and interactables). Press Enter to departure, once you're on board of a train. You can view the map using M, which updates as you travel. Restart using R if you get stuck.

Development

The main challenge of developing this game was the procedural generation of the train stations and the connections between them. So, it's a shame there isn't really an incentive to replay the game.

The music in the game was made by ShadyDave.

Total development time: 30 hours
